[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@nextgis/cancelable-promise](./cancelable-promise.md) &gt; [CancelablePromise](./cancelable-promise.cancelablepromise.md)

## CancelablePromise class

Promise that can be canceled

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CancelablePromise<T = any> implements Promise<T> 
```

## Example


```
import CancelablePromise from "@nextgis/cancelable-promise";

const promise = new CancelablePromise((resolve, reject) => {
 setTimeout(() => resolve(), 100);
}).catch((er) => {
 if (er.name === "CancelError") {
   // handle cancel error
 }
 throw er;
});

promise.cancel();

```
